column12: Sample_treatment_protocol_ch1
column13: Sample_growth_protocol_ch1
column15: Sample_extract_protocol_ch1
column16: Sample_data_processing
column38: Raw reads were trimmed using trimmomatic (v0.35, Parameters
column39: Each sample was aligned to hg38 genome using bowtie2 (v2.2.6, Parameters
column40: Peak calling was first performed on after pooling all samples using MACS2 (v2.1.0, parameters

column12: MCF7 cells were treated with DMSO of Fulvestrant (100nM) for 24 hours.
column13: MCF7 cells were obtained from ATCC and were cultured in DMEM/F-12 (Corning) and supplemented with 10% FBS, MEM non-essential amino acids (Corning), 50U/ml penicillin, and 50ng/ml streptomycin under normal oxygen conditions (5% CO2, 37 °C)
column15: ATAC-seq was performed as described by Buenrostro et al, 2013 with the exception that 0.2% NP40 was used for cell lysis., ATAC-seq libraries were prepared using Illumina's TruSeq ChIP sample prep.Libraries were validated using the Agient Technologies 2100 Bioanalyzer and Qubit high sensitivity assay.
column16: Duplicate reads were then removed using MarkDuplicates (v2.9.0, REMOVE_DUPLICATES, In order to account for Tn5 shift, all positive strand reads in each sample were shifted by +4bps and all negative strand reads were shifted by -5bps., BigWig tracks were generated using MACS2 and then scaled using rtracklayer (v1.40.6).
column38: TruSeq3-PE adapters, LEADING:3 TRAILING:3 SLIDINGWINDOW:4:15 MINLEN:36).
column40: --nomodel --extsize 150 --shift -75 --slocal 5000 --llocal 20000 -B --keep-dup all -p 0.05) and then on individual samples (-p 0.01).
